data.title: Didi J Official Website
data.text:
Didi J is an international pop artist and fashion designer with a big following and more than 3,4M instagram followers, based between Serbia and USA. Didi was born in Serbia but she always wanted to make it in America, she is also a cousin of famous ex first WTA tennis player Jelena Jankovic. Her career took off when she won the famous serbian pop festival. She began her career as a model. After that in 2014. she launched her own fashion brand called DJ by Didi J and had 3 fashion shows in Europe. She said she have plans to do the fashion show at NYFW soon.

Regarding her music career, Didi J started her American journey as an artist in 2016. when she went to the bootcamp called Marvelous in ATLANTA, GA where she recorded her first songs for USA market. After that in 2017. she released a feature with the famous rapper SHAGGY called SAY NO MORE. The song with Shaggy went great and Didi J was on radios, magazines etc. The video SAY NO MORE feat SHAGGY did a famous video producer Gil Green who has been working with Nicki Minaj, Jason Derulo, Pitbull and many more. On her first album she worked with the famous producers Jens and Toby Gad who has been working with Beyonce, Selena Gomez, Madonna and John Legend ( All of Me) record.

In 2018. Didi J had her first USA tour in 12 cities across the US including LA, Miami, Chicago, Phoenix Arizona, Seattle, Denver, Houston, San Diego where she performed mostly at the gay clubs and she got a lot of LGBT following there. People are saying that Didi J is a gay icon because of her special fashion taste. She also was on the cover of LA style mix magazine in Los Angeles.

In 2019. Didi released her single Sorry and the video was done in NY and ATL.

Her latest release was a single called MR BENJI in 2020.

Didi J is popular because of her unique fashion style and because she is a pop artist and fashion designer at the same time. While making her career in America Didi met a lot of US celebrities who gave her a full support about her career.

In 2021. Didi J is releasing her new album where she has features with a famous NBA Player Andre Drummondd, superstar Iggy Azalea, rapper She Real and many more. She also recoreded new music video that are coming out in December 2021. together with new album!
